name: Battle Robots: Confrontation
storyline:
Distant Future. Fierce battles for resources and power are taking place on the planets of the Wild Ten star system. The weapon in this confrontation is not infantry or tanks, but huge combat robots controlled by brave pilots. Corporations hire them to forcibly impose their rules and seize power.
You are one of the mercenaries who have arrived in the Wild Ten in search of a new home, and it is up to you to decide its fate on the battlefield.
summary: Battle Robots: Confrontation is an online PvP shooter in a sci-fi setting. Construct, upgrade and customise your robots, squad up with other pilots and unleash your power in epic battles on maps with many tactical options!
